title: Blake Gratton of Sarasota, FL Launches a Water Filtration Bottle to Help Kill Water-Borne Diseases
text:
Fit Bottle
Blake Gratton is focused on developing brands with a purpose, and Fit Bottle is a perfect fit for his mission of bringing revolutionary products to the market in order to help others. Recently launched, Fit Bottle is designed to conquer waterborne diseases in both developed and non-developed countries. It's all about providing clean drinking water to the world.
SARASOTA, Fla. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- At any given time, almost half the population of the developing world suffers from waterborne diseases. About four billion cases of diarrhea disease occur each year, resulting in about one million deaths. An assessment by the United Nations reports that four out of 10 people in Africa and Asia do not have access to clean water. As a matter of fact, a report published in the medical journal The Lancet concluded that unsafe drinking water takes on a greater human toll than terrorism and war combined. Hepatitis A, typhoid and cholera are all caused by bacteria and are the most common diarrheal diseases. Other illnesses like dysentery are caused by parasite that live in water contaminated by animal or people feces.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151014/277006
Working together, Blake Gratton and Fit Bottle are pioneers in the clean water industry. Fit Bottle is an innovative solution for keeping everyone healthy. It's definitely not your average water bottle. It makes water fit for anyone and anywhere. Fit Bottle has a unique filter and Activ-Flo technology. This nanotechnology was originally developed by NASA. Its Activ-Flo surface is made up of tiny pores that emit positive charges and attract negative charged contaminants of bacteria, viruses and protozoa. And with its zero adhesives, it doesn't lose any surface area to block harmful contaminants. Fit Bottle eliminates up to 99 percent of bacteria, viruses and harmful chemicals. These outstanding results have been substantiated by certified labs.
On a global scale, the need for clean, healthy drinking water has never been greater. Just in the United States alone, there are aging municipal water plants, high levels of chlorination in the drinking water and contaminated lakes, streams and rivers. With Fit Bottle, waterborne diseases can be eliminated while saving the planet, as it eliminates plastic disposable water bottles that are thrown into landfills. Like Blake Gratton , Fit Bottle is innovative, technical, and fueled to provide the world with safe, clean drinking water.
Take it on outdoor adventures when hiking, camping or swimming. Bring it along when you travel abroad and feel safe knowing you're drinking clean water with Fit Bottle. Stop wasting your money on bottled water and start pouring tap water right into Fit Bottle for clean and great tasting water. With its high purification levels and eco-friendly function, Fit Bottle is poised to take the world by storm. In time, it's likely to become a household name.
Why is everyone raving about Fit Bottle? Clean water, convenience, sustainability and practical function in the real world are just a few of the reasons propelling its popularity.
